nodes.text: Flare Ten was the callsign assigned to the tenth pilot of the New Republic's Flare Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, a Corellian pilot was designated this callsign during a battle with the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing over the planet Chadawa, where this hotshot X-wing pilot was able to get a solid hit on one of the Raider-class corvettes.
Flare Ten was first mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
